title: AchievementPopup displays correct achievement messages
description: Verify that the AchievementPopup component renders and displays accurate achievement notifications when the user reaches habit milestones.

steps.description: Simulate user reaching a habit milestone in the app
Check that AchievementPopup appears on screen
Verify the achievement message content matches the expected milestone description
Simulate another achievement with different milestone
Ensure the AchievementPopup updates with the new achievement message correctly

title: SplashScreen displays correctly on app startup
description: Ensure that the SplashScreen component shows immediately during app load and disappears smoothly once the main resources are ready, with no errors or delays.

steps.description: Launch the application
Verify the SplashScreen component is visible at startup
Verify no errors occur during splash screen display
Verify the SplashScreen is removed promptly after resources finish loading

title: Navigation via BottomNav is functional and responsive
description: Check that the BottomNav component allows users to navigate to all main app pages correctly on various screen sizes.

steps.description: Load the application on desktop resolution
Click each BottomNav item (Home, Settings, Profile, Progress, AI Assistant)
Verify the app navigates to the corresponding page for each item click
Resize viewport to mobile resolution
Repeat clicking each BottomNav item
Confirm navigation works correctly and UI remains usable

title: PushNotificationButton requests permission and manages subscriptions
description: Validate that clicking the PushNotificationButton prompts the user for push notification permission, subscribes appropriately if granted, and unsubscribes if permission is revoked.

steps.description: Click PushNotificationButton when notifications are not yet enabled
Browser requests push notification permission
Grant permission
Verify subscription request is sent to backend PushService
Ensure subscription is stored successfully on backend
Click PushNotificationButton when permission is already granted
Verify no new permission prompt appears and current subscription status is shown correctly
Revoke permission in browser settings
Click PushNotificationButton again
Verify permission prompt appears again or subscription is correctly unsubscribed on backend

title: usePushNotifications hook manages subscription lifecycle correctly
description: Test that the custom React hook usePushNotifications correctly handles subscription status, updates on permission changes, and communicates with the backend service.

steps.description: Mount a test component using usePushNotifications hook
Confirm initial subscription status is retrieved accurately
Simulate user granting push notification permission
Verify hook updates subscription state and calls backend subscribe endpoint
Simulate user revoking permission
Verify hook updates subscription state and calls backend unsubscribe endpoint

title: HomePage loads and displays main content correctly
description: Verify the HomePage renders on app launch with appropriate content and no errors across devices.

steps.description: Navigate to HomePage
Verify main landing content is rendered and visible
Check no rendering errors appear
Resize window to different viewports
Confirm layout remains user-friendly and content is accessible

title: ProfilePage allows viewing and editing user profile details
description: Ensure that users can view their profile information and successfully edit and save changes.

steps.description: Navigate to ProfilePage
Verify current user profile information is displayed correctly
Edit profile fields such as username, display name, or preferences
Submit changes
Verify success notification or confirmation
Refresh or reload the page
Verify changes persist and display reflects latest profile data

title: SettingsPage allows configuration changes persistently
description: Test that users can update app preferences in the SettingsPage and their settings are saved and reapplied correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to SettingsPage
Verify current settings are displayed
Change one or multiple preference settings (e.g., notification preferences, theme)
Save or apply changes
Check confirmation message that changes are saved
Reload the page or app
Verify that modified settings are kept and applied

title: ProgressPage renders accurate, real-time habit tracking data
description: Validate that the ProgressPage correctly displays up-to-date visual statistics and habit progress reflecting user data.

steps.description: Navigate to ProgressPage
Verify habit tracking data and statistics are shown
Simulate user completing new habit entries or progress
Verify ProgressPage updates immediately or on refresh with latest habit data
Test edge cases such as no habits tracked or excessively high totals
Verify ProgressPage handles these cases gracefully without errors

title: AiAssistantPage provides accurate and relevant responses
description: Check that the AI Assistant powered by OpenAI and Gemini APIs responds appropriately to user queries and habit coaching interactions.

steps.description: Navigate to AiAssistantPage
Input a habit coaching question or request
Verify that the AI assistant returns a relevant and meaningful response
Input a complex or ambiguous question
Verify that the AI assistant either clarifies or provides an appropriate fallback response
Simulate network or API error in AI services
Verify that AiAssistantPage handles errors gracefully and notifies the user

title: SEO component updates and injects correct metadata dynamically
description: Validate that the SEO component using react-helmet-async properly sets meta tags corresponding to each main page and updates them on navigation.

steps.description: Load each primary page (Home, Profile, Settings, Progress, AI Assistant)
Verify page metadata (title, description, keywords) matches page content
Navigate between pages using the app navigation
Ensure metadata updates dynamically without requiring full page reload

title: Layout component renders consistently and integrates navigation correctly
description: Confirm that the main Layout component wraps the application pages properly, including rendering BottomNav and other common UI elements consistently across device types.

steps.description: Render application pages within Layout component on desktop
Verify Layout displays BottomNav and other common elements
Resize viewport to mobile
Confirm Layout adjusts and BottomNav remains accessible and functional
